Control Statement: The organization provides a short-term uninterruptible power supply to facilitate [Selection (one or more): an orderly shutdown of the information system; transition of the information system to long-term alternate power] in the event of a primary power source loss.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: AT-3, CP-2, CP-7.References: None.
